* Iron Raptor looks in shock as she sees Dark One suddenly develop bloody holes in his chest, no sound coming from his open mouth as well.
Something was happening, something bad!
She glanced around the room, looking for anything that could give away the secret of what was happening in this room.
Iron Raptor steadied herself as she saw Tavatron rise to her feet, taking out her sword and calling out to�thin air?
There was far too much going on here that she didn�t understand far to many occurrences where it was impossible to know what was happening.
She glared around the room, still looking for something that could answer the question of what was going on.
It was that that she heard a very familiar voice, one that she thought that she would never hear again. Sure that the Alliance was going to kill her one way or another.
She could have sworn that she could have fainted with relief and utter surprise, not expecting to hear Prowl�s voice but surprised beyond belief that he was nowhere to me see.
Iron Raptor looked around frantically for the source of Prowl�s voice, waiting to see him anywhere in the room.
Where was he?!
Where could he be?
Was his voice just something that her mind heard on it�s own because it was something that she longed to hear?
Was it some cruel joke that the Alliance was playing with her to try and get her off guard?
What was going on?!!
A million questions raced through her mind as she searched the room, her spark sinking deeply when she still couldn�t seem to find him.
But then she suddenly got the shock of her life when she suddenly felt something touch her arm, giving out a cry of surprise and jumping back, her back hitting the wall with a loud thud.
Something was going on here, something that she couldn�t see OR explain.
Iron Raptor felt her spark beat like it was pumping fluid through her body a million times a second. Her breathing hard as she had plastered herself to the wall, staring right in front of herself for a moment before recovering and slowly leaning away from the wall.
While recovering she then remembered feeling something very similar to the touch she had just felt, some sort of comforting feeling that she knew well. It was Prowl.
Iron Raptor then looked at the air in front of her, a question on her mind.*

� Prowl?�
